about_the_game:
Hulda Ulfargsdottir finds an unlike companion and friend in Princess Zefya the Second. Both now fugitives and framed for crimes they never committed, can only seek refuge and turn for allies in the darkest corners of Folkswave...

  • Expand your Erannorth experience with over 300 new Cards, 110 new Enemies, new Challenges and fresh Events.
  • Fresh/Re-designed Events: All the vanilla events have been re-written from scratch, re-imagined and expanded with more choices. And in some cases with different branching paths, rewards, and overall variety to breath a fresh air in your Erannorth Reborn experience.
  • New Consumables & Trinkets: Enhance your tactics and sideboard with a large selection of consumables and trinkets, that can get you out of most tough spots.
  • New Organization: Join the Underworld Organization as any character, or unlock and play with their signature class 'Crime Lord' and experience a life full of intrigue debauchery and crime.
  • New Race: Unlock the Desert Nomad and join the malicious Acolytes of Sutekh or the charming Daughters of Hathor.
  • New Enemies: Spice up your runs with over 70 new Enemies and over 30 new Bosses.
  • New Challenges: New Challenges and Treasure Hunts.

A must have add-on that will seamlessly expand your Erannorth Reborn experience with a huge amount of new content.

content_descriptors.notes:
Erannorth Reborn contains references to Nudity, Fantasy Drugs (herbal infusions, potions etc.) and Alcohol.

Artworks of Playable Characters, Cards & Enemies (both Female and Male) are (under) dressed, in revealing and skimpy outfits that show off plenty of skin, cleavage and may contain partial or full Nudity.

detailed_description:
Hulda Ulfargsdottir finds an unlike companion and friend in Princess Zefya the Second. Both now fugitives and framed for crimes they never committed, can only seek refuge and turn for allies in the darkest corners of Folkswave...

  • Expand your Erannorth experience with over 300 new Cards, 110 new Enemies, new Challenges and fresh Events.
  • Fresh/Re-designed Events: All the vanilla events have been re-written from scratch, re-imagined and expanded with more choices. And in some cases with different branching paths, rewards, and overall variety to breath a fresh air in your Erannorth Reborn experience.
  • New Consumables & Trinkets: Enhance your tactics and sideboard with a large selection of consumables and trinkets, that can get you out of most tough spots.
  • New Organization: Join the Underworld Organization as any character, or unlock and play with their signature class 'Crime Lord' and experience a life full of intrigue debauchery and crime.
  • New Race: Unlock the Desert Nomad and join the malicious Acolytes of Sutekh or the charming Daughters of Hathor.
  • New Enemies: Spice up your runs with over 70 new Enemies and over 30 new Bosses.
  • New Challenges: New Challenges and Treasure Hunts.

A must have add-on that will seamlessly expand your Erannorth Reborn experience with a huge amount of new content.
name: Erannorth Reborn - Underworld

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64bit
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64bit
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX12 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 MB available space

short_description: Expand your Erannorth experience with over 300 new Cards, 110 new Enemies, new Challenges and fresh Events.
